name: Invisible 15-Puzzle
description:
This game is an unique 15-puzzle inspired by World's Hardest 15-Puzzle by ElGregos. 

FETURES:

  • Puzzle + Memory game.
  • The numbers only show 5 seconds on the board,  please try to remember them as soon as posible.
  • Limited only 300 steps to solve it.
  • You can challenge your best moves after replaying the game.
